TopicTitle: How much does this cost in the uk?

Articles.Content: I know its 18 USD which is like Ã‚Â£11, but what is the exact price?

Google says "18 U.S. dollars = 11.4678899 British pounds"

If you type (number)USD in GBP into google it converts Dollars to pounds automatically, I use it all the time.

Exchange rates fluctuate, and the above is probably more current, but I bought it just the other day and PayPal worked it out to be a touch under eleven quid.

Well worth it, so addictive and rewarding
Do you know the actual cost though? Or is it that exactly?

Do you know the actual cost though? Or is it that exactly?

OK, my mistake, I checked my PayPal history and on the 7th of this month it cost Ã‚Â£11.90.

As above though exchange rates change, but it won't affect the price by more than pennies either way....
IIRC, Pay Pal adds a little extra on top when it has to do a conversion... or something. So whatever google says, Pay Pal will charge a bit more.
Something I found recently as well, if you use a Debit card for overseas transactions, your bank may apply a Ã‚Â£1 fee.
